title: ENSLAVED™: Odyssey to the West™ Premium Edition
ENSLAVED™: Odyssey to the West™ Premium Edition

notes: You have to change the prefix to a windows xp one to install .net. It takes a long time (around 20 minutes) for .net to install but if you just let it go eventually the game will start.  It runs perfectly as far as I can tell but you do have to kill the process when you are done playing it.
